text: so I'm excited to announce
today Amazon Kinesis fire
hose which is a service that allows you
to easily load streaming data into AWS
and it's available
today so what it allows you to do is you
can take any streaming application it
could be a mobile application it can be
a web application it can be Telemetry
that's connected to a device and allows
you with a single put API call the
firose to load all of your data into AWS
initially you'll be able to choose to
load it into S3 or to Red shift or to
both over time will allow you to load
into all of our data stores and it means
that you can start
immediately querying the data loading
them into your Hado Club ERS and
starting to get that feel for what's
happening end to end in your
application the service elastically
scales for you you don't have to worry
about provisioning streams whatever
amount of data large or small you send
we will elastically adjust to allow you
to send that easily the service gives
you the option of concatenating your
data in any time interval you could
imagine or also in different chunk sizes
that you want to concatenate it
optionally gives you the uh the the
ability to compress that data using
standard compression methodologies and
it also gives you the option to encrypt
that data which means the data can be
encrypted on the way in and then
decrypted as the application needs to
use that data using the same key which
means you can be sure that the key is
stored securely and rotated quite easily
whenever you want so this is a very
different way to get streaming data into
AWS and into the cloud that I think our
customers are going to be very excited
about
